subject: Pro Plus Pedals VAM Compatibility
description_text:
Hey there,

I am looking to add a VAM set to my Pro Plus Pedals, but I'm a little confused as to what all I need to purchase to get them to work correctly.

Can you send me a list of what is necessary to get them setup with the Pro Plus Pedals, so that I may purchase?

Thanks!

Jack

conversations.body_text: Hi Jack Ridenour,  To upgrade to Pro Plus, you will need to purchase the PlusX control board, a dedicated power supply, and the VAM Pro motor. Please make sure to specify the type of power plug required for your country/region when placing the order.      Additionally, you can upgrade the damping and hydraulic kits for a more realistic pedal feel.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/plus-ultra-upgrade-kit
